name: places/ChIJPYUuLlNZwokRFeAMdSxCX2Y
formattedAddress: 321 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 321 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
PingPod is the perfect place near Times Square to be able to get away from the crowds and enjoy ping pong at any time of the day.

Being open 24/7, you book reservations on their website which then give you access to the locked building. Depending on the times, reservations can range from $15-30 per hour of play.

There are about 5 different tables you can reserve, with one table having a machine that will feed you ping pong balls to practice your returns.

They have a separate private room to play ping pong in that even has a disco light in case you feel like having a party while playing!

If you want, you can also work with coaches who can help you improve your game as well as help you buy a custom paddle that they will help design.

Finally, they do have key code lockers to use to store stuff while you play.

This is an amazing idea and is located in a great place! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for something to do in this area!

originalText.text: Amazing venue to play table tennis with friends or if you don't have anyone, join their community slack channel (you can find it on their website) and ask if anyone would be interested to play at a specific venue and time by letting them know your level (beginner/ intermediate/advanced). They provide the balls, and nets to pick balls. Not sure on bat, as I took my bat. Your playing is recorded and you can watch your shots and save it as well. (5 shots by default free I believe). The venue was busy during the weekend evening when I visited, so recommend advanced booking and also planning in advance if you want to find someone to play with you. Just book it on the website/app, and use your phone to unlock the door of the venue, go to the allocated board and start playing. You can buy a Tt kit from vending machine and also get drinks from vending machine. Good vibes! Happy pinging üèì

originalText.text:
Great place to play some ping pong!!

The website is easy to use to book a time slot of their many locations. No need to bring any equipment just check in and play. They also have open play events where you can play with many like minded folks, all there to have fun and improve their own game.

originalText.text:
I went here with my friends. It is 24/7 Gym dedicated to table tennis ‚Äúpingpod‚Äù. It‚Äôs a new establishment with multiple tables. It is open 24/7. Also they have a fridge for beverages, and merchandise with their labels
The camera video tapes the game so you rewind and look at the game. The space is monitored remotely for security. Digital scoring system, and ample balls to play üòÅ
The location is very central and easy to access and the place is clean and neat. There are sofas to relax too .

originalText.text: Ping pod is a fun and clean place to play table tennis whether for fun or competitive! They have a nice perk where you can keep score easily and have replays for your killer points! Coach david is fun to play with even though ill never beat him!
